DOC.brief_summary: Intrauterine device ( IUDs ) effective , long-acting method contraception . In order make accessible woman , health care provider must train insert . Physicians , physician assistant , nurse practitioner often learn first learning IUDs , practice model IUD manufacturer provide . Educators recently use sophisticated model teach clinical skill surgical procedure . We investigate whether model may useful teach IUD insertion .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation PelvicSim Simulator Training Intrauterine Device Insertions
